description: Golden Marguerite (Anthemis tinctoria 'Moonlight') is an amazing, low-maintenance plant. With bright golden-yellow, daisy-like flowers, it will add a cheery touch to your garden. The foliage is silver-green, making a striking contrast with the yellow blooms. The blooms are highly attractive to bees, butterflies and other beneficial insect species, making it an excellent source of nectar and pollen for wildlife. It is also drought-tolerant and deer-resistant, making it an ideal selection for a low-care garden. Easy to grow, it blooms throughout summer until the first hard frost. Its long flowering period and ability to fill in gaps in the garden makes it an asset for any garden.
